body:
I can't reproduce it. Did exactly what you did. Got the following:

![yii base errorexception - http yii2-basic local](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/47294/23356083/9ca4e5c8-fce9-11e6-8e0a-7deedab636a7.png)
If you have additional details â€” please post here.
I've seen this kind of broken Debug view on local machine, but failed to reproduce it

Which additional info do you need?

**Web-server:** nginx/1.10.2
**PHP**: 7.0.15 x64

### PHP modules enabled: ###
[PHP Modules]

- calendar
- Core
- ctype
- curl
- date
- dom
- exif
- fileinfo
- filter
- ftp
- gd
- gettext
- hash
- iconv
- intl
- json
- libxml
- mbstring
- mysqli
- mysqlnd
- openssl
- pcntl
- pcre
- PDO
- pdo_mysql
- Phar
- posix
- readline
- Reflection
- session
- shmop
- SimpleXML
- soap
- sockets
- SPL
- standard
- sysvmsg
- sysvsem
- sysvshm
- tokenizer
- wddx
- xdebug
- xml
- xmlreader
- xmlwriter
- xsl
- Zend OPcache
- zip
- zlib

[Zend Modules]

- Xdebug
- Zend OPcache
No idea. Please tell us how to reproduce the error starting with basic application else we can't fix it.

@samdark 

Ok. Look, you have:
![screen_4](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1772714/23357568/6cfc1430-fcef-11e6-906f-3a5ca5194baf.JPG)

But I have:
![screen_5](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1772714/23357567/6cf7d154-fcef-11e6-8c7e-b7a692f3d7a3.JPG)

Which OS do you have? C:\dev\... - like in Windows. But I have Debian 8.1 x64.

I have reproduced this bug again on other server (same as first one): 1. composer create-project --prefer-dist yiisoft/yii2-app-basic basic 2. edit @app/views/site/index.php ``` title = 'My Yii Application'; ?> render("index_include"); ?>
...
``` 3. Add file @app/views/site/index_include.php with content: ```
Yes, I've tested on Windows 10. Going to check on mac.

@samdark @SilverFire I have found it! This bug reproduces on systems with xdebug enabled! When I disable xdebug in PHP 7.0.15 config - bug has been disappeared!

PHP 7.0.15 (php-fpm)
php7.0-xdebug 2.5.0
Nginx 1.10.2

Hope now you can reproduce and confirm a bug.
